/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic @CMakeFiles/polly_sample.dir/objects1.rsp  -o polly_sample -Wl,-rpath,/source/sdk_build/aws-cpp-sdk-text-to-speech:/source/sdk_build/aws-cpp-sdk-polly:/source/sdk_build/aws-cpp-sdk-core ../aws-cpp-sdk-text-to-speech/libaws-cpp-sdk-text-to-speech.so ../aws-cpp-sdk-polly/libaws-cpp-sdk-polly.so ../aws-cpp-sdk-core/libaws-cpp-sdk-core.so -lpthread -lcurl -lssl -lcrypto -lz
